product_name: REI Midweight MTS Long Underwear Bottoms - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Midweight MTS long underwear bottoms for toddlers offer an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio and a soft hand for all-day comfort. MTS(R) (Moisture Transport System) fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly. A touch of spandex offers stretch and helps garment hold its shape; brushed interior adds softness. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Flat seams eliminate bulk while rib-knit ankle cuffs help seal out cold; gusseted crotch allows full range of motion.
short_description: The REI Midweight MTS long underwear bottoms for toddlers offer an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio and a soft hand for all-day comfort.
